crime_description: My car was stolen from the parking lot. It was a black sedan.
Someone entered my home and stole a laptop and some jewelry.
I was attacked by a group of people with sticks and suffered minor injuries.
An individual snatched my purse while I was walking on the street.
I received a fake email asking for my bank details and lost money to a scam.
A person threatened me with a knife and forced me to give them my wallet.
My phone was lost at the bus station.
Someone posted an offensive message about me on social media, impersonating my account.
A group of four men came into my shop, broke the glass counter, and took all the money.
A person I trusted refused to return my valuable belongings, committing a criminal breach of trust.
I was walking alone when someone suddenly grabbed me from behind.
A person threatened to harm my family if I didn't pay them money.
My identity was stolen and used to open a fraudulent bank account.
An attempt was made on my life. Someone tried to harm me seriously.
My property was damaged by an angry mob. They set fire to my shed.
I was assaulted and my phone was forcibly taken from me.
A neighbor keeps threatening to hurt me and my family.
A person created a fake document to claim ownership of my land.
My laptop was hacked, and my personal files were deleted.
I saw a large crowd of people fighting with each other on the street, causing public disorder.
My younger brother was taken from our home by an unknown person.
I found that my signature had been forged on a legal document.
My car was intentionally scratched and its tires were deflated.
